The time has come to complete the journey started at Maastricht towards a genuine EMU, with strong institutions & democratic accountability.
The euro is already a symbol of unity and a guarantee of stability for Europeans. We need now to make it a vehicle for shared prosperity.
We want an open, serious debate on ideas like a euro area treasury, a euro area finance minister, a European Monetary Fund. #deepeningEMU
We are calling for a far-reaching debate on strengthening the euro area's governance and democratic accountability. #deepeningEMU

Ce que nous proposons est nécessaire pour les États-membres actuels de la zone € - mais aussi en vue de la future adhesión d'autres pays.
En matière d'euro, c'est simple: le statu quo n'est pas une option! Il faut avancer. #deepeningEMU
